content: with a climbing diagonal line to the lel in it double_crochet in the fl of the same st and skip the next st before making the next st because each round is started in the next st aler the round is closed the first st of the next round will shil up 1 posicon in the chart the 1st st of each next round is indicated by the green arrow in the chart below the locacon of the green arrow in the chart indicates the 1st st of each round let s take round 13 as an example round 13 is crocheted in background color a this is shown in the verccal bar 1 at row 13 crochecng in the round causes the 1st st to shil 1 square to the lel in each round the shiling is indicated by the green line the green line is at the 14th verccal bar in round 13 that is the 1st st to be made for round 13 that first st is a blank square so it is a single_crochet then follow 2 squares with an x so 2 double_crochet then follow 2 blank squares 3 squares with an x and 2 blank squares 2 single_crochet 3 double_crochet 2 single_crochet the red border is reached now go to the beginning of the round to crochet the sctches in the verccal bars 4-14 1 complete repeat 20 st s for round 13 reads chain 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 single_crochet 3 double_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 8 single_crochet © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 5 to make the bokky bag we will first make the round base of the bag below you will find a pa ern for that any other round or square pa ern can be used for the base of the bag as long as the sctch count of the last round is a mulcple of 20 st s if you are not lining your bag i suggest to crochet a double layered base crochet the 2 parts together enclosing an old cd or plascc lid of a yogurt canister for extra support make sure the sctch count is a mulcple of 20 pa ern the base use hook size 3 5 mm round 1 a in a magic_ring chain 1 8 half_double_crochet slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st half_double_crochet to close the round pull the magic_ring closed 8 half_double_crochet round 2 a remember single_crochet in bl only the last 2 single_crochet are made in the same st as the chain 1 was made in as shown in the 1st photo below chain 1 2 single_crochet in the next st x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through color c cut color a 16 single_crochet © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 6 round 3 c crochet over the yarn end of color c remember double_crochet in fl only remember the 1st aeer the chain 1 is made in
